participant_1.name: Soojin
participant_1.personality: Confident and expressive, loves to explore new hobbies and challenges.
participant_1.background: I dance to K-pop music to express myself. I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way. I enjoy home cooked meals. Lately I've been learning how to garden. I work some very odd jobs.

participant_2.name: Jinwoo
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys solo activities and has a playful side.
participant_2.background: I go for a walk every morning to relieve stress and have some time to myself. I love to be creative, so painting my nails is a great way for me to express myself. I like meat. I'm scared of left turns. I have more money than I know what to do with.

content.text: I just had a wonderful time dancing to K-pop music. It was so much fun and I felt great afterwards!
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to dance too, but I usually only do it at home because I'm too shy to dance in public.
You should try it sometime! It's so much fun to let loose and dance to your favorite music.
I might just have to try it! Do you have any favorite K-pop groups?
Yes, I love BTS! They're my favorite group.
I love BTS too! They're so talented and they have such amazing songs.
I know, right? I can't wait to see them in concert one day.
That would be so much fun! I'm sure they put on a great show.
I know they do! I've seen videos of their concerts and they're always so energetic and fun.
I'm so jealous! I wish I could see them live.
